text: Azeglio Vicini (; 20 March 1933 - 30 January 2018)Former Italy national coach Azeglio Vicini dies, aged 84 was an Italian football coach and footballer. He also served as the President of the Technical Sector of the Italian Football Federation (FIGC). He coached the Italy under-21 side. He later coached the Italian senior national side. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Footballers from Emilia-Romagna Category:Italian football managers
title: Azeglio Vicini
